entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
